item.title: Copy Tables to Backup Tables in Postgresql
item.description: Copy tables to an _old as backup 1CREATE TABLE new_table AS 2TABLE existing_table; See details in https://www.postgresqltutorial.com/postgresql-copy-table/

item.description: 1\d+ <table_name> Without the "+", only normal table descriptions will be shown.

item.title: Rename An Index in Postgresql
item.description: Rename an Index 1ALTER INDEX the_oldtablename_idx01 RENAME TO thenewtablename_idx01 NOTE: This has similar syntax for renaming primary key. The only difference noted is that for primary key, the suffix is always _pkey. In index, it's either idxNN or idexNN (where NN is a nunber, e.g. '01')

item.title: Update Table Column Comments in Postgresql
item.description: Update comments on table columns 1COMMENT ON COLUMN <table_name>.<column_name> IS '<new_comment_here>'; See Stackoverflow reference and Postgres.org reference NOTE: Comment cannot be altered or dropped. To remove comment, set it to NULL as follows: 1COMMENT ON COLUMN <table_name>.<column_name> IS NULL;

item.description: Rename a Primary Key 1ALTER INDEX the_oldtablename_pkey RENAME TO thenewtablename_pkey
